function open() {return true;}
// Email obfuscator script 2.1 by Tim Williams, University of Arizona
// Random encryption key feature by Andrew Moulden, Site Engineering Ltd
// This code is freeware provided these four comment lines remain intact
// A wizard to generate this code is at http://www.jottings.com/obfuscator/
{ coded = "ZCNR4bCZsOYR@1mSmNjZ3jNREYsjNb.hYG"
  key = "siANJXoGRZ3E20SheOwIa9UKqW6HpL1tTV4mulnrYzgcfyPDxbC7M8jB5QdkFv"
  shift=coded.length
  link=""
  for (i=0; i&lt;coded.length; i++) {
    if (key.indexOf(coded.charAt(i))==-1) {
      ltr = coded.charAt(i)
      link += (ltr)
    }
    else {
      ltr = (key.indexOf(coded.charAt(i))-shift+key.length) % key.length
      link += (key.charAt(ltr))
    }
  }
}
orgn();

   Licorice Root (Glycyrrhiza glabra)
  </title>
  <meta content="Glycyrrhizin is one of the active constituents of licorice. It possesses antidepressant effects, and heals mucous membranes of the digestive tract. It may cause peripheral edema (fluid retention), which goes away when licorice is stopped. Because glycyrrhizin " name="DESCRIPTION"/>

   /   /   -   -   &gt;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "      
   s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   p   a   g   e   a   d   2   .   g   o   o   g   l   e   s   y   n   d   i   c   a   t   i   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   p   a   g   e   a   d   /   s   h   o   w   _   a   d   s   .   j   s   "   &gt;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;      
   G   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n       i   s       o   n   e       o   f       t   h   e       a   c   t   i   v   e       c   o   n   s   t   i   t   u   e   n   t   s       o   f       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e   .       I   t       p   o   s   s   e   s   s   e   s       a   n   t   i   d   e   p   r   e   s   s   a   n   t       e   f   f   e   c   t   s   ,       a   n   d       h   e   a   l   s       a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   G   6   7   3   '   &gt;   m   u   c   o   u   s       m   e   m   b   r   a   n   e   s   /   a   &gt;       o   f       t   h   e       d   i   g   e   s   t   i   v   e       t   r   a   c   t   . B   e   c   a   u   s   e       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n       c   a   n       c   a   u   s   e       h   i   g   h       b   l   o   o   d       p   r   e   s   s   u   r   e       a   n   d       o   t   h   e   r       p   r   o   b   l   e   m   s   ,       i   t       s   h   o   u   l   d       o   n   l   y       b   e       t   a   k   e   n       o   n       t   h   e       a   d   v   i   c   e       o   f       a       h   e   a   l   t   h       c   a   r   e       p   r   a   c   t   i   t   i   o   n   e   r   .   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   D   G   L       s   t   a   n   d   s       f   o   r       D   e   -   G   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n   a   t   e   d       L   i   c   o   r   i   c   e   . S   i   n   c   e       t   h   e       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n       i   s       r   e   m   o   v   e   d   ,       D   G   L       d   o   e   s       n   o   t       c   a   u   s   e       t   h   e   s   e       p   o   t   e   n   t   i   a   l   l   y       h   a   r   m   f   u   l       s   i   d   e       e   f   f   e   c   t   s   .   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   L   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       c   a   n       b   e       t   a   k   e   n       i   n       t   h   e       f   o   l   l   o   w   i   n   g       f   o   r   m   s   :   u   l   &gt;   l   i   &gt;   D   r   i   e   d       r   o   o   t   :       1       t   o       5   g       a   s       a   n       i   n   f   u   s   i   o   n       o   r       a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   G   1   7   1   '   &gt;   d   e   c   o   c   t   i   o   n   /   a   &gt;       t   h   r   e   e       t   i   m   e   s       p   e   r       d   a   y   /   l   i   &gt;   l   i   &gt;   2   5   0   -   5   0   0   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   G   6   6   2   '   &gt;   :       2       t   o       5   m   l       t   h   r   e   e       t   i   m   e   s       p   e   r       d   a   y   /   l   i   &gt;   l   i   &gt;   D   G   L       e   x   t   r   a   c   t   :       0   .   4       t   o       1   .   6   g       t   h   r   e   e       t   i   m   e   s       p   e   r       d   a   y       f   o   r       a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   G   9   6   2   '   &gt;   L   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       R   o   o   t       (   G   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   a       g   l   a   b   r   a   )       c   a   n       h   e   l   p       w   i   t   h       t   h   e       f   o   l   l   o   w   i   n   g   :   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   t   a   b   l   e       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   &gt;   D   i   g   e   s   t   i   o   n   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   3   7   3   7   3   7   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   H   e   a   r   t   b   u   r   n       /       G   E   R   D   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   A       s   o   m   e   t   i   m   e   s       e   f   f   e   c   t   i   v   e       w   a   y       t   o       r   e   s   o   l   v   e       r   e   f   l   u   x       a   n   d       i   n   d   i   g   e   s   t   i   o   n       i   s       t   h   e       u   s   e       o   f       D   G   L       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       f   o   r       a       f   e   w       d   a   y   s   .   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   1   9   6   1   3   7   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   G   a   s   t   r   i   c   /   P   e   p   t   i   c       U   l   c   e   r   s   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   L   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t   ,       p   a   r   t   i   c   u   l   a   r   l   y       d   e   g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   e   d       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e   ,       c   a   n       b   e       a       u   s   e   f   u   l       a   d   j   u   n   c   t       t   o       a   n   t   i   b   i   o   t   i   c       t   r   e   a   t   m   e   n   t       b   e   c   a   u   s   e       i   t       a   c   c   e   l   e   r   a   t   e   s       t   h   e       h   e   a   l   i   n   g       o   f       t   h   e       s   t   o   m   a   c   h       l   i   n   i   n   g   .       D   e   g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   e   d       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t       (   D   G   L   )       a   n   d       g   l   u   t   a   m   i   n   e       h   a   v   e       b   e   e   n       u   s   e   d       t   o       g   e   t       p   e   o   p   l   e       o   f   f       o   f       a   n   t   a   c   i   d   s   ,       H   2       b   l   o   c   k   e   r   s       a   n   d       p   r   o   t   o   n       p   u   m   p       i   n   h   i   b   i   t   e   r   s       (   P   P   I   )   .       A       t   y   p   i   c   a   l       d   o   s   e       o   f       D   G   L       w   i   l   l       b   e       5   0   0   m   g       t   i   d       e   i   t   h   e   r       w   i   t   h       o   r       w   i   t   h   o   u   t       a       m   e   a   l   .   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   I   n       a       s   t   u   d   y       o   f       D   G   L       i   n       g   a   s   t   r   i   c       u   l   c   e   r   s   ,       3   3       g   a   s   t   r   i   c       u   l   c   e   r       p   a   t   i   e   n   t   s       w   e   r   e       t   r   e   a   t   e   d       w   i   t   h       e   i   t   h   e   r       D   G   L       (   7   6   0   m   g       T   I   D   )       o   r       a       p   l   a   c   e   b   o       f   o   r       o   n   e       m   o   n   t   h   .       T   h   e   r   e       w   a   s       a       s   i   g   n   i   f   i   c   a   n   t   l   y       g   r   e   a   t   e   r       r   e   d   u   c   t   i   o   n       i   n       u   l   c   e   r       s   i   z   e       i   n       t   h   e       D   G   L       g   r   o   u   p       (   7   8   %   )   ,       t   h   a   n       i   n       t   h   e       p   l   a   c   e   b   o       g   r   o   u   p       (   3   4   %   )   .       C   o   m   p   l   e   t   e       h   e   a   l   i   n   g       o   c   c   u   r   r   e   d       i   n       4   4   %       o   f       t   h   o   s   e       r   e   c   e   i   v   i   n   g       D   G   L   ,       b   u   t       i   n       o   n   l   y       6   %       o   f       t   h   e       p   l   a   c   e   b   o       g   r   o   u   p   .       [   i   &gt;   G   u   t       1   9   6   9   :   1   0   ;       p   p   .   2   9   9   -   3   0   3   /   i   &gt;   ]   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   E   m   e   r   g   e   n   c   y       C   a   r   e   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   N   o   t       r   e   c   o   m   m   e   n   d   e   d       f   o   r   :   /   b   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   c   r   o   s   s   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   6   8   1   8   7   3   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   U   p   c   o   m   i   n   g       S   u   r   g   i   c   a   l       P   r   o   c   e   d   u   r   e   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   H   i   g   h       d   o   s   e   s       o   f       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       m   a   y       e   l   e   v   a   t   e       b   l   o   o   d       p   r   e   s   s   u   r   e       o   r       p   r   o   m   o   t   e       a   n       e   l   e   c   t   r   o   l   y   t   e       i   m   b   a   l   a   n   c   e       f   r   o   m       p   o   t   a   s   s   i   u   m       l   o   s   s   .   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   H   o   r   m   o   n   e   s   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   1   7   6   4   9   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   L   o   w       A   d   r   e   n   a   l       F   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       /       A   d   r   e   n   a   l       I   n   s   u   f   f   i   c   i   e   n   c   y   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   I   f       c   o   r   t   i   s   o   l       l   e   v   e   l   s       a   r   e       l   o   w   ,       o   n   e       o   f       t   h   e       w   a   y   s       t   o       s   u   s   t   a   i   n       m   o   r   e       n   o   r   m   a   l       l   e   v   e   l   s       i   s       t   o       s   l   o   w       o   r       i   n   h   i   b   i   t       i   t   s       b   r   e   a   k   d   o   w   n   .       T   h   i   s       c   a   n       b   e       a   c   c   o   m   p   l   i   s   h   e   d       n   a   t   u   r   a   l   l   y   .   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   T   h   e       o   n   l   y       k   n   o   w   n       r   e   a   d   i   l   y       a   v   a   i   l   a   b   l   e       i   n   h   i   b   i   t   o   r   s       o   f       t   h   e       e   n   z   y   m   e       t   h   a   t       d   e   a   c   t   i   v   a   t   e   s       c   o   r   t   i   s   o   l       (   1   1       b   e   t   a   -   H   S   D   )       a   r   e       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   c       a   c   i   d       (   f   o   u   n   d       i   n       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t       e   x   t   r   a   c   t   )   ,       p   r   o   g   e   s   t   e   r   o   n   e   ,       a   n   d       f   l   a   v   o   n   o   i   d   s       (   i   n       g   r   a   p   e   f   r   u   i   t   )   .       T   h   e       c   o   n   c   e   p   t       o   f       e   x   t   e   n   d   i   n   g       c   o   r   t   i   s   o   l       b   i   o   a   c   t   i   v   i   t   y       v   i   a       1   1       b   e   t   a   -   H   S   D       i   n   h   i   b   i   t   i   o   n       i   s       w   e   l   l       e   s   t   a   b   l   i   s   h   e   d   ,       b   u   t       t   h   e       m   a   n   n   e   r       i   n       w   h   i   c   h       p   r   o   g   e   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       a   l   t   e   r   s       1   1       b   e   t   a   -   H   S   D       i   s       n   o   t       c   u   r   r   e   n   t   l   y       c   l   e   a   r   .       Y   o   u       c   o   u   l   d       e   a   t       1   0       t   o       1   5       g   r   a   p   e   f   r   u   i   t   s       o   r       t   a   k   e       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t       e   x   t   r   a   c   t       t   o       s   u   s   t   a   i   n       c   o   r   t   i   s   o   l       l   e   v   e   l   s   .       H   o   w   e   v   e   r   ,       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t       u   s   e   d       r   e   g   u   l   a   r   l   y       i   n       l   a   r   g   e       d   o   s   e   s       c   a   n       p   r   o   d   u   c   e       h   i   g   h       b   l   o   o   d       p   r   e   s   s   u   r   e   ,       w   a   t   e   r       r   e   t   e   n   t   i   o   n   ,       p   o   t   a   s   s   i   u   m       w   a   s   t   i   n   g   ,       a   n   d       b   r   e   a   s   t       e   n   l   a   r   g   e   m   e   n   t       i   n       m   e   n   .       A       N   a   t   u   r   o   p   a   t   h   i   c       D   o   c   t   o   r       s   h   o   u   l   d       b   e       a   b   l   e       t   o       g   u   i   d   e       y   o   u       i   n       u   s   i   n   g       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t       a   l   o   n   e       o   r       i   n       c   o   m   b   i   n   a   t   i   o   n       w   i   t   h       o   t   h   e   r       a   d   r   e   n   a   l       a   g   e   n   t   s   .   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   5   6   9   0   9   7   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   E   l   e   v   a   t   e   d       T   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       L   e   v   e   l   ,       M   a   l   e   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   1   7       h   e   a   l   t   h   y       m   a   l   e   s       b   e   t   w   e   e   n       2   2       a   n   d       2   4       y   e   a   r   s       o   f       a   g   e           c   o   n   s   u   m   e   d       7   g   /   d   a   y       o   f       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       t   a   b   l   e   t   s       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   i   n   g       7   .   6   %       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   c       a   c   i   d       o   v   e   r       a       7   -   d   a   y       p   e   r   i   o   d   .       O   n       d   a   y   s       4       a   n   d       8   ,       s   e   r   u   m       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       l   e   v   e   l   s       w   e   r   e       d   e   c   r   e   a   s   e   d       b   y       2   5   %   ,       w   i   t   h       a   n       i   n   c   r   e   a   s   e       i   n       1   7   -   h   y   d   r   o   x   y   p   r   o   g   e   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       a   n   d       l   u   t   e   i   n   i   z   i   n   g       h   o   r   m   o   n   e   ,       a   n   d       a       s   l   i   g   h   t       b   u   t       n   o   t       s   i   g   n   i   f   i   c   a   n   t       r   e   d   u   c   t   i   o   n       i   n       f   r   e   e       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e   .       [   i   &gt;   E   x   p       C   l   i   n       E   n   d   o   c   r   i   n   o   l       D   i   a   b   e   t   e   s   .       2   0   0   3   ;   1   1   1   :       p   p   .   3   4   1   -   3   4   3   /   i   &gt;   ]   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   N   o   t       r   e   c   o   m   m   e   n   d   e   d       f   o   r   :   /   b   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   c   r   o   s   s   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   1   4   9   8   5   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   L   o   w       T   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       L   e   v   e   l   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   1   7       h   e   a   l   t   h   y       m   a   l   e   s       b   e   t   w   e   e   n       2   2       a   n   d       2   4       y   e   a   r   s       o   f       a   g   e           c   o   n   s   u   m   e   d       7   g   /   d   a   y       o   f       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       t   a   b   l   e   t   s       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   i   n   g       7   .   6   %       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   c       a   c   i   d       o   v   e   r       a       7   -   d   a   y       p   e   r   i   o   d   .       O   n       d   a   y   s       4       a   n   d       8   ,       s   e   r   u   m       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       l   e   v   e   l   s       w   e   r   e       d   e   c   r   e   a   s   e   d       b   y       2   5   %   ,       w   i   t   h       a   n       i   n   c   r   e   a   s   e       i   n       1   7   -   h   y   d   r   o   x   y   p   r   o   g   e   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       a   n   d       l   u   t   e   i   n   i   z   i   n   g       h   o   r   m   o   n   e   ,       a   n   d       a       s   l   i   g   h   t       b   u   t       n   o   t       s   i   g   n   i   f   i   c   a   n   t       r   e   d   u   c   t   i   o   n       i   n       f   r   e   e       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e   .       [   i   &gt;   E   x   p       C   l   i   n       E   n   d   o   c   r   i   n   o   l       D   i   a   b   e   t   e   s   .       2   0   0   3   ;   1   1   1   :       p   p   .   3   4   1   -   3   4   3   /   i   &gt;   ]   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   I   m   m   u   n   i   t   y   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   3   2   8   4   4   9   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   C   a   n   k   e   r       S   o   r   e   s       (   A   p   h   t   h   o   u   s       U   l   c   e   r   s   )   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   F   o   r       a   c   u   t   e       t   r   e   a   t   m   e   n   t   ,       D   G   L       (   d   e   -   g   l   y   c   e   r   r   i   z   i   n   a   t   e   d       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t   )       t   o   p   i   c   a   l   l   y       m   a   y       p   r   o   v   e       t   o       b   e       o   f       b   e   n   e   f   i   t   .       A       m   i   x   t   u   r   e       o   f       D   G   L       a   n   d       w   a   r   m       w   a   t   e   r       a   p   p   l   i   e   d       t   o       t   h   e       i   n   s   i   d   e       o   f       t   h   e       m   o   u   t   h       m   a   y       s   h   o   r   t   e   n       t   h   e       h   e   a   l   i   n   g       t   i   m   e       f   o   r       m   o   u   t   h       u   l   c   e   r   s   .       T   h   i   s       D   G   L       m   i   x   t   u   r   e       i   s       m   a   d   e       b   y       c   o   m   b   i   n   i   n   g       2   0   0   m   g       o   f       p   o   w   d   e   r   e   d       D   G   L       a   n   d       1       c   u   p       o   r       l   e   s   s       (   2   5   0   m   l   )       o   f       w   a   r   m       w   a   t   e   r   .    /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   I   n   f   e   c   t   i   o   n   s   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   1   4   9   9   6   1   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   H   e   r   p   e   s       I   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   T   h   e       t   o   p   i   c   a   l       a   p   p   l   i   c   a   t   i   o   n       o   f       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       e   x   t   r   a   c   t   s       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   i   n   g       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   a       m   a   y       h   a   s   t   e   n       r   e   c   o   v   e   r   y       o   f       o   r   a   l       h   e   r   p   e   s       l   e   s   i   o   n   s   .   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   1   5   0   8   4   9   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   S   T   D       H   e   r   p   e   s       I   I   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   L   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   s       a   n   t   i   v   i   r   a   l       s   u   b   s   t   a   n   c   e   s   ,       l   i   k   e       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   a   .    /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   M   e   t   a   b   o   l   i   c   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   1   1   7   1   0   5   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   A   n   o   r   e   x   i   a       /       S   t   a   r   v   a   t   i   o   n       T   e   n   d   e   n   c   y   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   P   o   s   s   e   s   s   e   s       a   n   t   i   d   e   p   r   e   s   s   a   n   t       e   f   f   e   c   t   s   ,       a   n   d       h   e   a   l   s       m   u   c   o   u   s       m   e   m   b   r   a   n   e   s       o   f       t   h   e       d   i   g   e   s   t   i   v   e       t   r   a   c   t   .   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   2   0   4   1   2   9   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   B   l   o   o   d       T   y   p   e       O   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   2   0   5   9   0   5   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   B   l   o   o   d       T   y   p   e       B   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   O   r   g   a   n       H   e   a   l   t   h   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   3   2   3   1   2   1   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   H   e   p   a   t   i   t   i   s   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   2   5   0       t   o       5   0   0   m   g       t   h   r   e   e       t   i   m   e   s       p   e   r       d   a   y   .    /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   R   e   s   p   i   r   a   t   o   r   y   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   1   1   7   9   9   3   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   A   s   t   h   m   a   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   G   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n   ,       f   o   u   n   d       i   n       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t   ,       s   h   o   w   s       s   t   e   r   o   i   d   -   I   i   k   e       a   c   t   i   v   i   t   y       a   n   d       h   a   s       a       l   o   n   g       h   i   s   t   o   r   y       o   f       u   s   e       a   s       a   n       a   n   t   i   -   i   n   f   l   a   m   m   a   t   o   r   y       a   n   d       a   n   t   i   -   a   l   l   e   r   g   i   c       a   g   e   n   t   ,       a   c   t   i   o   n   s       w   h   i   c   h       h   a   v   e       n   o   w       b   e   e   n       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   e   d   .    b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   5   5   5   7   7   7   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   B   r   o   n   c   h   i   t   i   s   ,       A   c   u   t   e   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   L   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t   ,       a   m   o   n   g       o   t   h   e   r       h   e   r   b   s   ,       i   s       a       c   o   m   m   o   n   l   y   -   u   s   e   d       e   x   p   e   c   t   o   r   a   n   t       t   o       e   a   s   e       m   u   c   u   s       r   e   m   o   v   a   l       i   n       b   r   o   n   c   h   i   t   i   s   .   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   8   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   U   r   o   -   G   e   n   i   t   a   l   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   7   2   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   4   8   5   6   2   5   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   P   o   l   y   c   y   s   t   i   c       O   v   a   r   y       S   y   n   d   r   o   m   e       (   P   C   O   S   )   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   I   n       a       1   9   8   2       t   r   i   a   l   ,       e   i   g   h   t       a   n   o   v   u   l   a   t   o   r   y       i   n   f   e   r   t   i   l   e       w   o   m   e   n       w   i   t   h       e   l   e   v   a   t   e   d       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       w   e   r   e       i   n   v   e   s   t   i   g   a   t   e   d       f   o   r       l   o   w   e   r   i   n   g       s   e   r   u   m       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       l   e   v   e   l   s       a   n   d       i   n   d   u   c   i   n   g       r   e   g   u   l   a   r       o   v   u   l   a   t   i   o   n       b   y       a       f   o   r   m   u   l   a       c   o   n   t   a   i   n   i   n   g       e   q   u   a   l       p   a   r   t   s       o   f       p   e   o   n   y       r   o   o   t       (   P   a   e   o   n   i   a       l   a   c   t   i   f   l   o   r   a   )       a   n   d       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       r   o   o   t       (   G   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   a       g   l   a   b   r   a   )   .       S   e   r   u   m       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       l   e   v   e   l   s       w   e   r   e       s   i   g   n   i   f   i   c   a   n   t   l   y       l   o   w   e   r   e   d       i   n       s   e   v   e   n       p   a   t   i   e   n   t   s       b   y       d   o   s   e   s       o   f       5   -   1   0       g   r   a   m   s       o   f       t   h   e       c   o   m   b   i   n   a   t   i   o   n       d   a   i   l   y       f   o   r       2   -   8       w   e   e   k   s   .       S   i   x       o   f       s   e   v   e   n       p   a   t   i   e   n   t   s       o   v   u   l   a   t   e   d       r   e   g   u   l   a   r   l   y       a   n   d       t   w   o       o   f       s   i   x       p   a   t   i   e   n   t   s       c   o   n   c   e   i   v   e   d       (   Y   a   g   i   n   u   m   a       e   t       a   l   .   )       I   n       a       s   i   m   i   l   a   r       t   r   i   a   l       i   n       1   9   8   8   ,       a       s   i   g   n   i   f   i   c   a   n   t       r   e   d   u   c   t   i   o   n       o   f       c   i   r   c   u   l   a   t   i   n   g       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       o   c   c   u   r   r   e   d       i   n       1   8       o   f       2   0       f   e   m   a   l   e       s   u   b   j   e   c   t   s       w   i   t   h       P   C   O   S       (   T   a   k   a   h   a   s   h   i       e   t       a   l   .   )   .       F   i   v   e       o   f       t   h   e       1   8       b   e   c   a   m   e       p   r   e   g   n   a   n   t   .       I   n       t   h   e       a   b   o   v   e       t   r   i   a   l   s   ,       i   t       w   a   s       n   o   t       e   s   t   a   b   l   i   s   h   e   d       w   h   i   c   h       p   l   a   n   t       o   r       p   l   a   n   t       c   o   n   s   t   i   t   u   e   n   t   s       a   l   t   e   r   e   d       t   h   e       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       l   e   v   e   l   s   .       I   n       1   9   9   1   ,       r   e   s   e   a   r   c   h   e   r   s       p   e   r   f   o   r   m   e   d       i   n       v   i   t   r   o       t   e   s   t   s       o   f       t   h   e       e   f   f   e   c   t   s       o   f       s   e   v   e   r   a   l       p   l   a   n   t       c   o   n   s   t   i   t   u   e   n   t   s       f   r   o   m       p   e   o   n   y       a   n   d       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       o   n       r   a   t       o   v   a   r   y       c   e   l   l   s   ,       a   n   d       s   u   g   g   e   s   t   e   d       t   h   a   t       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   e   t   i   c       a   c   i   d   ,       a       m   e   t   a   b   o   l   i   t   e       o   f       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n       i   n       h   u   m   a   n   s   ,       i   n   h   i   b   i   t   s       t   h   e       c   o   n   v   e   r   s   i   o   n       o   f       a   n   d   r   o   s   t   e   n   e   d   i   o   n   e       t   o       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e   .       A   r   m   a   n   i   n   i       e   t       a   l   .       s   u   g   g   e   s   t   e   d       t   h   a   t       g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n   ,       o   r       i   t   s       m   e   t   a   b   o   l   i   t   e   s   ,       a   c   t       o   n       t   h   e       e   n   z   y   m   e   s       t   h   a   t       c   o   n   v   e   r   t       1   7   -   h   y   d   r   o   x   y   -   p   r   o   g   e   s   t   e   r   o   n   e       t   o       a   n   d   r   o   s   t   e   n   e   d   i   o   n   e   ,       e   f   f   e   c   t   i   v   e   l   y       l   o   w   e   r   i   n   g       t   e   s   t   o   s   t   e   r   o   n   e   .   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   F   o   r       e   x   a   m   p   l   e   ,       e   q   u   a   l       p   a   r   t   s       o   f       M   e   d   i   h   e   r   b       e   x   t   r   a   c   t   s       c   a   n       b   e       m   i   x   e   d       t   o   g   e   t   h   e   r       a   n   d       g   i   v   e   n       a   t       a       d   o   s   e       o   f       1   /   2       t   o       1       t   e   a   s   p   o   o   n       o   f       t   h   e       m   i   x   t   u   r   e   ,       2   -   3       t   i   m   e   s       p   e   r       d   a   y   .       T   r   e   a   t   m   e   n   t       c   a   n       c   o   n   t   i   n   u   e       f   o   r       s   i   x       m   o   n   t   h   s       w   i   t   h       a       b   r   e   a   k       o   f       a   t       l   e   a   s   t       o   n   e       w   e   e   k       e   v   e   r   y       4   -   6       w   e   e   k   s   .   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   5   4   9   4   5   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   P   r   e   m   e   n   s   t   r   u   a   l       S   y   n   d   r   o   m   e       P   M   S       H       (   H   e   a   v   i   n   e   s   s   )   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   N   o   t       r   e   c   o   m   m   e   n   d   e   d       f   o   r   :   /   b   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   T   1   1   4   3   3   .   h   t   m   l   #   K   '   &gt;   i   m   g       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   c   r   o   s   s   .   g   i   f   '       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   b   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   '   .   .   /   c   o   n   d   /   C   3   5   7   7   5   3   .   h   t   m   l   '   &gt;   P   o   s   s   i   b   l   e       P   r   e   g   n   a   n   c   y   -   R   e   l   a   t   e   d       I   s   s   u   e   s   /   a   &gt;   /   b   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   2   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   5   %   '       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   '   t   o   p   '       n   o   w   r   a   p   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   3   2   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   W   h   y   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   5   %   '       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   '   #   C   C   C   C   C   C   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       f   a   c   e   =   '   a   r   i   a   l   '       s   i   z   e   =   '   2   '   &gt;   A       h   i   g   h       c   o   n   s   u   m   p   t   i   o   n       o   f       l   i   c   o   r   i   c   e       (   g   l   y   c   y   r   r   h   i   z   i   n       5   0   0   m   g       p   e   r       w   e   e   k   )       w   a   s       a   s   s   o   c   i   a   t   e   d       w   i   t   h       a   n       i   n   c   r   e   a   s   e   d       r   i   s   k       o   f       p   r   e   t   e   r   m       d   e   l   i   v   e   r   y       i   n       a       s   t   u   d   y       F   i   n   n   i   s   h       w   o   m   e   n   .       [   i   &gt;   A   m       J       E   p   i   d   e   m   i   o   l       2   0   0   2   ;   1   5   6   (   9   )   :       p   p   .   8   0   3   -   5   /   i   &gt;   ]   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   4   '       b   a   c   k   g   r   o   u   n   d   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   r   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       s   i   z   e   =   '   0   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   4   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   2   4   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   b   l   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   4   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   2   4   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   9   %   '       b   a   c   k   g   r   o   u   n   d   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   b   .   g   i   f   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   2   4   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       s   i   z   e   =   '   0   '   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   4   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   2   4   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   b   r   .   g   i   f   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   4   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   2   4   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   K   '   &gt;   f   o   n   t       s   i   z   e   =   '   +   3   '   &gt;   u   &gt;   b   &gt;   K   E   Y   /   b   &gt;   /   u   &gt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   1   0   0   %   '       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   '   0   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   4   0   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   1   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   0   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   9   %   '   &gt;   M   a   y       d   o       s   o   m   e       g   o   o   d   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   4   0   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   t   i   c   k   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   0   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   9   %   '   &gt;   L   i   k   e   l   y       t   o       h   e   l   p   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;

   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   4   0   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   c   r   o   s   s   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   2   0   '   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   '   .   .   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   2   0   p   i   x   .   g   i   f   '   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   9   9   %   '   &gt;   R   e   a   s   o   n   a   b   l   y       l   i   k   e   l   y       t   o       c   a   u   s   e       p   r   o   b   l   e   m   s   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
      
   /   t   d   &gt;

   /   b   r   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   p   &gt;   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   k   o   n   a   f   i   l   t   e   r   "   &gt;      
   p       a   l   i   g   n   =   '   j   u   s   t   i   f   y   '   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   f   o   n   t       s   i   z   e   =   '   +   3   '   &gt;   u   &gt;   b   &gt;   G   L   O   S   S   A   R   Y   /   b   &gt;   /   u   &gt;   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;      
   f   o   n   t       s   i   z   e   =   '   -   1   '   &gt;      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   G   1   7   1   '   &gt;   D   e   c   o   c   t   i   o   n   :   /   b   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       L   i   q   u   i   d       p   r   e   p   a   r   e   d       b   y       b   o   i   l   i   n   g       p   l   a   n   t       m   a   t   e   r   i   a   l       i   n       w   a   t   e   r       f   o   r       a       p   e   r   i   o   d       o   f       t   i   m   e   .      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   G   2   0   0   '   &gt;   E   d   e   m   a   :   /   b   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       A   b   n   o   r   m   a   l       a   c   c   u   m   u   l   a   t   i   o   n       o   f       f   l   u   i   d   s       w   i   t   h   i   n       t   i   s   s   u   e   s       r   e   s   u   l   t   i   n   g       i   n       s   w   e   l   l   i   n   g   .      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   G   6   6   2   '   &gt;   M   i   l   l   i   g   r   a   m   :   /   b   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       (   m   g   )   :       1   /   1   ,   0   0   0       o   f       a       g   r   a   m       b   y       w   e   i   g   h   t   .      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   G   6   7   3   '   &gt;   M   u   c   o   u   s       M   e   m   b   r   a   n   e   s   :   /   b   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       T   h   e       m   e   m   b   r   a   n   e   s   ,       s   u   c   h       a   s       t   h   e       m   o   u   s   e   ,       n   o   s   e   ,       a   n   u   s   ,       a   n   d       v   a   g   i   n   a   ,       t   h   a   t       l   i   n   e       t   h   e       c   a   v   i   t   i   e   s       a   n   d       c   a   n   a   l   s       o   f       t   h   e       b   o   d   y       w   h   i   c   h       c   o   m   m   u   n   i   c   a   t   e       w   i   t   h       t   h   e       a   i   r   .      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   G   9   6   2   '   &gt;   P   e   p   t   i   c       U   l   c   e   r   :   /   b   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       A       g   e   n   e   r   a   l       t   e   r   m       f   o   r       b   &gt;   g   a   s   t   r   i   c       u   l   c   e   r   s   /   b   &gt;       (   s   t   o   m   a   c   h   )       a   n   d       b   &gt;   d   u   o   d   e   n   a   l       u   l   c   e   r   s   /   b   &gt;       (   d   u   o   d   e   n   u   m   )   ,       o   p   e   n       s   o   r   e   s       i   n       t   h   e       s   t   o   m   a   c   h       o   r       d   u   o   d   e   n   u   m       c   a   u   s   e   d       b   y       d   i   g   e   s   t   i   v   e       j   u   i   c   e   s       a   n   d       s   t   o   m   a   c   h       a   c   i   d   .       M   o   s   t       u   l   c   e   r   s       a   r   e       n   o       l   a   r   g   e   r       t   h   a   n       a       p   e   n   c   i   l       e   r   a   s   e   r   ,       b   u   t       t   h   e   y       c   a   n       c   a   u   s   e       t   r   e   m   e   n   d   o   u   s       d   i   s   c   o   m   f   o   r   t       a   n   d       p   a   i   n   .           T   h   e   y       o   c   c   u   r       m   o   s   t       f   r   e   q   u   e   n   t   l   y       i   n       t   h   e       6   0       t   o       7   0       a   g   e       g   r   o   u   p   ,       a   n   d       s   l   i   g   h   t   l   y       m   o   r   e       o   f   t   e   n       i   n       m   e   n       t   h   a   n       i   n       w   o   m   e   n   .           D   o   c   t   o   r   s       n   o   w       k   n   o   w       t   h   a   t       t   h   e   r   e       a   r   e       t   w   o       m   a   j   o   r       c   a   u   s   e   s       o   f       u   l   c   e   r   s   :       m   o   s   t       o   f   t   e   n       p   a   t   i   e   n   t   s       a   r   e       i   n   f   e   c   t   e   d       w   i   t   h       t   h   e       b   a   c   t   e   r   i   a       H   e   l   i   c   o   b   a   c   t   e   r       p   y   l   o   r   i       (   H   .       p   y   l   o   r   i   )   ;       o   t   h   e   r   s       a   r   e       r   e   g   u   l   a   r       u   s   e   r   s       o   f       n   o   n   -   s   t   e   r   o   i   d   a   l       a   n   t   i   -   i   n   f   l   a   m   m   a   t   o   r   y       d   r   u   g   s       (   N   S   A   I   D   S   )   ,       w   h   i   c   h       i   n   c   l   u   d   e       c   o   m   m   o   n       p   r   o   d   u   c   t   s       l   i   k   e       a   s   p   i   r   i   n       a   n   d       i   b   u   p   r   o   f   e   n   .      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   G   4   7   5   '   &gt;   T   i   n   c   t   u   r   e   :   /   b   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       A   n       a   l   c   o   h   o   l       o   r       w   a   t   e   r   -   a   l   c   o   h   o   l       s   o   l   u   t   i   o   n   ,       u   s   u   a   l   l   y       r   e   f   e   r   r   i   n   g       t   o       a       p   r   e   p   a   r   a   t   i   o   n       f   r   o   m       h   e   r   b   a   l       m   a   t   e   r   i   a   l   s   .      
   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   '   G   4   8   3   '   &gt;   U   l   c   e   r   :   /   b   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       L   e   s   i   o   n       o   n       t   h   e       s   k   i   n       o   r       m   u   c   o   u   s       m   e   m   b   r   a   n   e   .      
   /   f   o   n   t   &gt;   /   p   &gt;      
      
   /   d   i   v   &gt;   p   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   b   r   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;      
   /   d   i   v   &gt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;      
      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   '   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   '   &gt;      
   v   a   r       i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   _   p   i   d       =       8   9   9   6   2   ;      
   v   a   r       i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   _   w   s   i   d       =       0   ;       v   a   r       i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   _   l   i   n   k   _   c   o   l   o   r       =       '   0   0   0   0   F   F   '   ;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       s   r   c   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   .   i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   s   .   c   o   m   /   j   s   /   i   n   f   o   l   i   n   k   s   _   m   a   i   n   .   j   s   "   &gt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;      
   v   a   r       g   a   J   s   H   o   s   t       =       (   (   "   h   t   t   p   s   :   "       =   =       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   .   p   r   o   t   o   c   o   l   )       ?       "   h   t   t   p   s   :   /   /   s   s   l   .   "       :       "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   "   )   ;      
   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   w   r   i   t   e   (   u   n   e   s   c   a   p   e   (   "   %   3   C   s   c   r   i   p   t       s   r   c   =   '   "       +       g   a   J   s   H   o   s   t       +       "   g   o   o   g   l   e   -   a   n   a   l   y   t   i   c   s   .   c   o   m   /   g   a   .   j   s   '       t   y   p   e   =   '   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   '   %   3   E   %   3   C   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   %   3   E   "   )   )   ;      
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;      
   t   r   y       {      
   v   a   r       p   a   g   e   T   r   a   c   k   e   r       =       _   g   a   t   .   _   g   e   t   T   r   a   c   k   e   r   (   "   U   A   -   1   1   8   7   9   4   8   8   -   1   "   )   ;      
   p   a   g   e   T   r   a   c   k   e   r   .   _   t   r   a   c   k   P   a   g   e   v   i   e   w   (   )   ;      
   }       c   a   t   c   h   (   e   r   r   )       {   }   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   /   b   o   d   y   &gt;      
   /   h   t   m   l   &gt;
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
